channel.title: Minimap Client v2
channel.description:
[img]http://zachera.com/rs/minimap2(5).png[/img]
This is my minimap client, which I've been working (slowly) on for a while now. It's meant to act like the map applet, in a sense, but not really. This is something I like to play around with when I get bored.
[b][size=12pt]What you see above is the exact size of the map region when loaded. Don't bother modifying the size of the client, you're only going to see black spaces![/size][/b]
Some buggy things:
[ul][*]Login screen [*]When you move around in a map region which is already loaded, it shows black spaces [*]You need to teleport to move[/ul]
This is a great tool for taking screenshots; just get the coordinations of what you want to take a picture of and vuala!
Download link: Cache: [url=http://zachera.ws/files/zip/cache.zip]http://zachera.ws/files/zip/cache.zip[/url] Client: [url=http://zachera.ws/files/zip/minimapv2.zip]http://zachera.ws/files/zip/minimapV2.zip[/url]
Enjoy!

item.title: Minimap Client v2
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“qauters, post:10, topic:208248”][quote author=Zachera link=topic=274520.msg2245138#msg2245138 date=1211881419]

Qauters did that on the new engine, only his showed everything exactly like the minimap ^^

I disabled markMinimap() since it was giving me ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.
[/quote]
You have to create your own markMinimap() ;), because the official markMinimap uses the minimap interface and calculates the differences when transforming the angle etc.
It’s not that hard realy.[/quote]I’m sure deobs help a lot :P.

Anyhow, atleast the guy is contributing right? Good job Zachera, you have my thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Minimap Client v2
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Zachera:

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=274520.msg2244231#msg2244231 date=1211845094]Qauters did that on the new engine, only his showed everything exactly like the minimap ^^

I disabled markMinimap() since it was giving me ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.[/quote]
You have to create your own markMinimap() ;), because the official markMinimap uses the minimap interface and calculates the differences when transforming the angle etc.
It’s not that hard realy.

Read full topic

item.title: Minimap Client v2
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Speljohan:

Qauters did that on the new engine, only his showed everything exactly like the minimap ^^

I disabled markMinimap() since it was giving me ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

Read full topic

item.title: Minimap Client v2
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Zachera, post:7, topic:208248”][quote author=BAsh(CntLgn) link=topic=274520.msg2243506#msg2243506 date=1211802205]
Looks good.

Any idea how to load the entire minimap? I would like a copy, specifically with information like where you can walk and so on. The aim is an anywhere walker.
[/quote]
Not yet.

[quote author=frank_ link=topic=274520.msg2243507#msg2243507 date=1211802235]
how old is the data?

Any idea how to load the entire minimap? I would like a copy, specifically with information like where you can walk and so on. The aim is an anywhere walker.
[/quote]thats not minimap data you twat

the client link is supposed to have a ‘V’ not a ‘v’, also seems nice cant wait to try it out, and mess with it

Fixed.

So you expanded the size of the minimap interface so that it would show the entire region, then resized the frame to fit it?

Yep. But I didn’t resize it myself. I modified the size of the applet through the code. ;)[/quote]Qauters did that on the new engine, only his showed everything exactly like the minimap ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Minimap Client v2
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“BAsh(CntLgn), post:2, topic:208248”]Looks good.

Any idea how to load the entire minimap? I would like a copy, specifically with information like where you can walk and so on. The aim is an anywhere walker.[/quote]
Not yet.

[quote=“frank_, post:3, topic:208248”]how old is the data?

[quote author=BAsh(CntLgn) link=topic=274520.msg2243506#msg2243506 date=1211802205]
Any idea how to load the entire minimap? I would like a copy, specifically with information like where you can walk and so on. The aim is an anywhere walker.
[/quote]thats not minimap data you twat[/quote]

nueb35:

the client link is supposed to have a ‘V’ not a ‘v’, also seems nice cant wait to try it out, and mess with it

Fixed.

Unhandled:

So you expanded the size of the minimap interface so that it would show the entire region, then resized the frame to fit it?

Yep. But I didn’t resize it myself. I modified the size of the applet through the code.

Read full topic

[quote=“frank_, post:3, topic:208248”]how old is the data?

Any idea how to load the entire minimap? I would like a copy, specifically with information like where you can walk and so on. The aim is an anywhere walker.
[/quote]thats not minimap data you twat[/quote]

Edit: Pitty its the 317 client. Not very useful.

@z wrote:

This is my minimap client, which I’ve been working (slowly) on for a while now. It’s meant to act like the map applet, in a sense, but not really. This is something I like to play around with when I get bored.

[size=12pt]What you see above is the exact size of the map region when loaded. Don’t bother modifying the size of the client, you’re only going to see black spaces![/size]

Some buggy things:

[ul][]Login screen
[]When you move around in a map region which is already loaded, it shows black spaces
[*]You need to teleport to move[/ul]

This is a great tool for taking screenshots; just get the coordinations of what you want to take a picture of and vuala!

Download link:
Cache: http://zachera.ws/files/zip/cache.zip
Client: http://zachera.ws/files/zip/minimapV2.zip

Enjoy!
